bullet.name: Plasma Burst
bullet.description: Fast controlled bursts of plasma. Should cut though most creatures and obstacles.

health.name: Health
health.description: Augments to your protective energy shield to last longer

missile_tank.name: Desolation Pulse
missile_tank.description: Larger plasma bust module. Takes longer to change, but is more effective against obstacles and creatures.

high_jump.name: Gravity Constrictor
high_jump.description: Lowers the gravity around you, allowing you to jump higher.

ice_beam.name: Temporal Disruptor
ice_beam.description: Slows time around animated targets, rendering them disabled for a time. You could probably walk on them
